title: Planning & Research
text:
Objective
To build a clear, multi-page MBA portfolio that showcases my background, highlights key certifications, and guides a recruiter smoothly from overview to detail.




Section Structure
Recruiters scan in this order:

About Me → Education → Experience → Certifications → Skills → Contact
Sticking to that order makes the site intuitive.

Design & Accessibility

Single-column layout on mobile, two-column on desktop

High contrast (dark text on white) for readability

Alt text on all images for screen-readers

Interactive Elements
Rather than static lists, I chose interactive modals (for certificates) to keep the main pages focused and uncluttered.






MBA (2024–2025) at University Canada West—ongoing

11 years bridging Accounting (financial reporting, auditing) and Construction Supervision (rural road projects)

Certifications in Generative AI (Microsoft × LinkedIn) & Digital Marketing (DMI × AMA)

Core strengths: budgeting, team leadership, data-driven decision making






Quarto for Markdown → HTML and multi-page site

Bootstrap “cosmo” theme with light custom CSS

Git + GitHub Pages for version control and deployment

ChatGPT-4o for initial brainstorming (raw output in LLM Draft page)

This plan ensured each assignment requirement maps to a clear page or section, and that I could track my process end-to-end.

title: MBA Portfolio: Karma Galley
text:
I am currently pursuing an MBA (2024 – 2025) at University Canada West with a background that bridges accounting and large-scale construction supervision.
Over 11 years I have managed corporate ledgers, payroll, and compliance as an Accountant, and later led rural road-building projects as a Construction Supervisor.
This dual experience gives me a unique perspective on budgeting, operations, and field execution.
I’m passionate about using data-driven insights and emerging technologies—especially Generative AI and digital marketing—to deliver projects that improve lives in underserved communities.




MBA — University Canada West (in progress, expected 2025)

B.Com — North Bengal University, India (2007)








Oversaw rural road construction projects in remote regions of Bhutan

Coordinated site logistics, procurement, and labor teams of up to 60 staff

Enforced safety and quality standards, delivering projects on schedule and within budget





Managed bookkeeping, payroll, and monthly financial reporting

Prepared financial statements and maintained the general ledger

Supported external audits and produced budget forecasts that reduced variance by 8 %









 Career Essentials in Generative AI — Microsoft × LinkedIn Learning View certificate 


 Certified Digital Marketing Associate — DMI × AMA View certificate 































Financial Accounting • Budgeting & Forecasting • Project Management • Generative AI Basics • Digital Marketing • Team Leadership • Stakeholder Communication

title: Reflection on Building My One-Page MBA Portfolio
text:
I reviewed three MBA portfolios (Chen, 2023; Gómez, 2024; Li, 2024)…



I used ChatGPT-4o (OpenAI, 2025) with the prompt: > “Create an outline and sample text for a one-page MBA student portfolio.” The model produced headings and sample sentences…




About Me: rewrote for voice and specificity.
Experience: added exact dates and metrics.
Skills: grouped and removed duplicates.




I set up _quarto.yml, customized Bootstrap 5 theme, added small CSS tweaks for modals.
